AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Technical Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 11:32 IST
 Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Rajasthan |  Salary : 29,200 to 92,300




FOLLOW

The Arid Forest Research Institute Jodhpur (AFRI Jodhpur) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Technical Assistant Posts.  Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Diploma in Civil Engineering can apply for the AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Rajasthan.

AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technical Assistant	02	Any Degree
01	Diploma in Civil Engineering

AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 30 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For OBC/ EWS candidates: Rs. 1,100/-.
For Women candidates: Rs. 750/-. 

AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 29,200/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 92,300/- per month.
How to Apply for the AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the AFRI Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the deadline. 
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	26-08-2025
Closing date	14-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
